ygData.subject: RE: mino horn on Innourkk
ygData.msgSnippet: you re kidding right? mino s are between level 10-15 on average in steam, and high teens in beholders maze, you should be able to kill one with one hand tied
ygData.messageBody:
you're kidding right? mino's are between level 10-15 on average in steam,
and high teens in beholders maze, you should be able to kill one with one
hand tied behind your back...

any mino that has a bag in his hand should drop a horn i think, cant
remember

Minkin
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James [SMTP:manickd@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 10:45 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] mino horn on Innourkk
>
> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> OK can some one help me on Innourkk to get a horn? I have a level 31
> wizard
> and a 33 necro to do that task. I would be greatly indebted..... :)
>
> Magnuss of Innourkk
>
> PS I love my bard more then any char I have played :)
>
